title: Mistaken Mates: Hers for the Holiday Prequel
description: After a steamy one-night stand that she just can't get out of her mind, Trisha tries to return to a normal life. She has no idea that her one hot encounter has mated her to sexy panther shifter Bradley.But misunderstandings and jealousy keep popping up and stopping this couple from finding their happily ever after. Will they work together and figure things out, or was all of this just one big mistake?
author: Jane Knight
